author: Anonymous Atom
title: Prereading for next week?
question: How do we know which modules we need done before which lectures? http://cs110.students.cs.ubc.ca/schedule.html lists the material covered for each day, so do we need to have completed all of module 2 : HtDD before monday/tuesday?
student_answer: There's a list of pre-lecture videos that we need to watch first. You can find this in the EDx, particularly in the lecture section.
